publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-550 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.4) (Scotland) Order 2003-That the Health Committee recommends that the Draft Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.4) (Scotland) Order 2003 (SSI 2003/501) be approved. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe*

S2M-550 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.4) (Scotland) Order 2003-That the Health Committee recommends that the Draft Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.4) (Scotland) Order 2003 (SSI 2003/501) be approved. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe
